column2: ADAM KUKYKTARYNYN ZhALPYGHA BIRDEI DEKLARATSIYaSY

Adam balasy uielmeninin barlyk mushelerine ten kadir-kasietin, kukyktarynyn tendigi men tartyp alynbaityndyghyn tanu, bostandyk pen edildiktin zhene zhalpygha birdei beibitshiliktin negizi bolyp tabylatynyna nazar audara otyryp,

adam kukyktaryna degen elemeushilik, mensinbeushilik adam balasy arynyn zyghyrdanyn kainatatyn taghylyk zhaghdaigha ekelip soghatynyna zhene dunie zhuzi adamdary soz ben nanym-senim bostandyktaryna ie bolyp, urei men muktazhdyktan ada bola alatyn ortany kuru â€“ adam balasynyn zhoghary mertebeli umtylysy dep zhariyalanghanyna nazar audara otyryp,
adam balasy zorlyk-zombylyk pen kanaugha karsy koteriliske mezhbur bolatyn zhaghdaidy tudyrmau ushin, adam kukyktary zan biligimen korghaluy kerek ekenine nazar audara otyryp,
khalyktar arasynda dostyk karym-katynastyn damuyna zherdemdesu kerek ekenine nazar audara otyryp,

BirikkenUlttar elderi oz Zharghysynda negizgi adam kukyktaryna, zheke adam basynyn kadir-kasieti men kundylyghyna zhene erler men eielderdin tendigine senimderin rastap, eleumettik progress pen adamgha ylaiyk omir suru dengeiin, naktylanghan bostandyktardan tys, ken aukymdy bostandyktardy arttyrugha zherdemdesu kerek degen sheshimge kelgenderine nazar audara otyryp,
mushe-memleketter Birikken Ulttar Uiymymen yntyktamasa otyryp, adam kukyktary men negizgi bostandyktary zhalpygha birdei kurmettelip saktaluyna ykpal zhasaugha mindettengenderine nazar audara otyryp,
osy mindettemelerdi tolykkandy zhuzege asyru zholynda osy kukyktar men bostandyktardyn men-maghynasy men erekshelitkterin ughynyp tusinudin manyzy zor ekendigine nazar audara otyryp,
BAS ASSAMBLEYa,

Adam kukyktarynyn zhalpygha birdei Deklaratsiyasyn bukil khalyktar men memleketterdin umtylystary arkyly er adammen katar, koghamnyn er organy osy deklaratsiyany unemi zhadynda tutyp, bilim beru zhene aghartu zhumystary arkyly osy kukyktar men bostandyktardy kadir tutugha ykpal zhasap, ulttyk khalykaralyk sharalar arkyly Uiymnyn mushe-memleketterinin khalyktarymen kosa, olardyn yurisdiktsiyasyna karasty territoryalardyn khalyktary arasynda da, zhalpygha birdei tiimdi turde tanylyp, zhuzege asyryluy ushin algha koiylghan maksat retinde zhariya etip otyr.
1 bap

Barlyk adamdar tumysynan azat zhene kadir-kasieti men kukyktary ten bolyp duniege keledi. Adamdargha akyl-parasat, ar-ozhdan berilgen, sondyktan olar bir-birimen tuystyk, bauyrmaldyk karym-katynas zhasaulary tiis.
2 bap

er adam, nesiline, tur-tusine, zhynysyna. tiline, dinine, sayasi nemese baska da nanym-senimderine, ulttyk, nemese eleumettik tegine, muliktik. tektik-toptyk, nemese baska da zhaghdayattargha karamastan osy Deklaratsiyada zhariyalanghan barlyk kukyktar men bostandyktargha alalanbai, birdei ten ie boluy tiis.

Sonymen katar, eshkim de ozi turatyn elinin, ne bolmasa territoriyanyn sayasi, kukyktyk, nemese khalykaralyk mertebesinin negizi boiynsha, zhene de ol territoriya teuelsiz, elde bireudin karamaghynda, elde ozin-ozi baskarushy emes, nemese onyn egemendigi erturli nysanda shekteuli bolghan kunnin ozinde de, alalanbauy tiis.
3 bap
er adam omir suruge, bostandykta bolugha zhene onyn zheke basyna kol sughylmauyna kukyly.
4 bap
Eshkim de kuldykta nemese kiriptarlykta ustaluy tiis emes. Kuldyk pen kul saudasyna, kandai turde bolsa da, tyiym salynady.
5 bap
Eshkim de azaptalugha nemese kadir-kasietin korlaityndai adamshylykka zhatpaityn katygezdik zholmen zhebirlenuge, nemese zhazalanugha tiis emes.
6 bap
er adam kai zherde zhurse de, kukyktyk subektisi retinde tanyluyna kukyly.
7 bap

Zan aldynda zhurttyn beri ten zhene de zan arkyly alalanbai, birdei ten korghalugha kukyly. Barlyk adam osy Deklaratsiyanyn erezhelerin buzatyn kemsituden zhene kemsituge arandatushylyktyn barlyk turinen ten korghalugha kukyly.
8 bap
er adam, konstitutsiyamen, nemese zanmen berilgen negizgi kukyktary buzylghan zhaghdaida, kukyghyn kuzyretti ulttyk sot arkyly tiimdi turde kalpyna keltiruge kukyly.
9 bap
Eshkim de negizsiz tutkyndalugha, kamauda ustalugha nemese kughyngha ushyratylugha tiis emes.
10 bap

er adam, ozinin kukyktary men mindetterin anyktap, ozine taghylghan kylmystyk aiyptaudyn negizdiligin belgileu ushin, isi tolyk tendik negizinde, edilettik talaptargha sai, teuelsiz zhene edil sot arkyly ashyk karaluyna kukyghy bar.
11 bap
Kylmys zhasady dep aiyptalghan er adam, korghanu kukyghy kamtamasyzdandyrylyp, zandy zhene ashyk sot talkylauy onyn kinesin tolyk anyktaghangha deiin, kinesiz dep esepteluge kukyghy bar.

Eshkim de zhasaghan ereketi nemese ereketsizdigi negizinde, eger ol ereketi ulttyk zandar men khalykaralyk kukyk boiynsha kylmys bolyp sanalmasa, zhauapka tartylmaidy. Sonymen katar kylmys ushin berilgen zhaza, kylmys zhasalghan kezde zanmen kozdelgen zhazadan auyr bolmaugha tiis.
12 bap

er adam zheke zhene otbasylyk omirine ozgelerdin oz betinshe aralasuynan, ozbyrlyk zhasap baspanasyna, khat zhazysyp-alysu kupiyasyna kol sughuynan, ar-namysy men abyroi bedeline nuksan keltiruinen korghalugha kukyghy bar.
13 bap
er adamnyn er memlekettin ishinde zhurip-turuyna zhene oz kalauynsha turatyn meken-zhaidy tandauyna kukyghy bar.
er adam kez-kelgen elden, sonyn ishinde ozinin tughan elinen, baska elge konys audarugha zhene oz eline kaityp oralugha kukyly.
14 bap
er adamnyn kughyngha ushyraghan zhaghdaida, baska elderden baspana izdep zhene sol baspanany paidalanugha kukyghy bar.
Bul kukyk shyntuatynda sayasi emes kylmystyn negizinde, nemese Birikken Ulttar Uiymynyn maksattary men kaghidalaryna kaishy keletin ereketteri ushin kughyndalghandargha zhurmeidi.
15 bap
er adamnyn azamattykka kukyghy bar.
Eshkimdi de azamattyghynan nemese azamattyghyn ozgertu kukyghynan eriksiz aiyrugha bolmaidy.
16 bap

Kemelettik zhaska tolghan erler men eielder ozderinin nesiline, ultyna, dinine karamastan nekege turyp, otbasyn kurugha kukyly. Olar nekege turghan, nekede bolghan zhene azhyraskan kezde birdei kukyktardy paidalanady.
Neke, tek eki zhaktyn ozara erkin zhene tolyk kelisimi boiynsha ghana kiylady.
Otabasy koghamnyn tabighi zhene negizgi uyasy bolyp tabylady, zhene kogham men memleket tarapynan korghalugha kukyly.
17 bap.
er adamnyn dunie mulikti zheke ozi, nemese baskalarmen birlesip iemdenuge kukyghy bar.
Eshkim de oz mulkinen eriksiz airylmaugha tiis.
18 bap

er adam oi-pikir, ar-ozhdan zhene din bostandyghyna kukyghy bar; bul kukyk oz dinin nemese nanym-senimin ozgertu erkindigin, oz dinin, nanym-senimin zheke ozi, nemese baska adamdarmen birigip tutyp, zhariya turde, nemese zheke zholmen uaghyzdau, kudaigha kulshylyk etu, dini salt-zhoralaryn oryndau bostandyghyn da kamtyidy.
19 bap

er adam nanym-senim bostandyghyna zhene oz kozkarasyn erkin bildiruine kukyghy bar; bul kukyk oz nanym-senimin kedergisiz ustanu erkindigin zhene memlekettik shekaralar tertibine teueldi bolyp kalmai, akparattar men ideyalardy erkin izdep, kez-kelgen kuraldar arkyly taratu bostandyghyn da kamtyidy.
20 bap
er adamnyn beibit zhinalystar zhene assotsiatsiyaalardy kuru bostandyghyna kukyghy bar.
Eshkimdi de belgili bir assotsiatsiyagha zorlykpen kirgizuge bolmaidy.
21 bap
er adamnyn, oz elin baskaru isine tikelei ozi, nemese erikti turde sailanghan okilderi arkyly katysugha kukyghy bar.
er adam oz elinde memlekettik kyzmetke ten derezhede kol zhetkizuge kukyly.

Khalyktyn erki ukimet biliginin negizi boluy tiis; bul erik merzimdi zhene burmalanbaghan sailau arkyly zhuzege asyryluy tiis . Sailau zhalpygha birdei ten sailau kukyghy negizinde, zhasyryn dauys beru zholymen, nemese osy siyakty sailau bostandyghyn kamtamasyz etetin baska da, osy mendes edister arkyly otkizilui tiis.
22 bap

er adam, kogham mushesi retinde, eleumettik zhaghynan kamsyzdandyryluyna zhene onyn kadir-kasieti koldau tabuyna, zheke basy erkin kemeldenuine kazhetti ekonomikalyk, eleumettik zhene medeni salalar boiynsha kukyktary erbir memlekettin kurylymy men ressurstaryna sai, ulttyk ykpal zhene khalykaralyk yntymaktastyk arkyly zhuzege asyryluyna kukygy bar.
23 bap
er adamnyn enbek etuge, zhumys turin erkin tandaugha, edil zhene kolaily enbek zhaghdaiyna, zhumyssyzdyktan korghaluyna kukyghy bar.
er adamnyn kundylyghy ten enbegi ushin, nendei bir kemsitusiz, ten enbek aky aluyna kukyghy bar.

Zhumys istep zhurgen er adam ozinin zhene otbasynyn ylaiykty omir suruin kamtamasyz etetindei edil zhene kanaghattanarlyk, zhene, kazhet bolghan kezde, baska eleumettik kamsyzdandyru kuraldary arkyly tolyktyrylyp otyratyn, syi-siyapatka kukyly.
er adam kesipodaktaryn kurugha zhene oz muddelerin korghau ushin, kesipodaktaryna kiruge kukyly.
24 bap
er adam tynyghugha zhene medeni demalugha, onyn ishinde akylgha konymdy shekteuli zhumys kunine zhene merzimdi akyly demalyska, kukyly.
25 bap

er adam ozinin zhene otbasy mushelerinin den-saulyghyn el-aukatyn kamtamasyz etetindei, tamakty, kiimdi, baspanany, meditsinalyk kutimdi kamtyityn omir suru dengeiine kukyly zhene de zhumyssyz kalghan kunde, naukas bolghan kezde, mugedek bolyp kalghan, zhesir bolyp kalghan kunde, kartaighan shakta, nemese ozine bailanysty emes baska da sebeptermen tirshilik etu mumkinshiliginen aiyrylyp kalghan zhaghdaida kamsyzdandyryluyna kukyly.
Ana zhene nereste bolu zhaghdaiy airyksha kamkorlyk pen komek alugha kukyk beredi. Balalardyn beri, nekeli nemese nekesiz tughan, birdei eleumettik korghaudy paidalanady.
26 bap

er adamnyn bilim alugha kukyghy bar. Bilim beru, en bolmaghanda bastauysh zhene zhalpy bilim, tegin boluy tiis. Bastauysh bilim barshagha mindetti boluy tiis. Tekhnikalyk zhene kesiptik bilim kopshiliktin koly zheterliktei boluy tiis zhene zhoghary bilim de, erkimnin kabiletine karai kopshiliktin koly zheterliktei boluy tiis.

Bilim beru adamnyn zheke basynyn tolyk kemeldenuine zhene kukyktary men negizgi bostandyktaryna degen kurmetti arttyrugha baghyttaluy tiis. Bilim beru barlyk ulttar, nesildik zhene dini toptary arasynda tusinistik, shydamdylyk pen dostyk karym-katynas ornatugha ykpal zhasap zhene Birikken Ulttar Uiymynyn beibitshilikti kuattau zholyndaghy zhumysyna ykpal zhasap, dem berui tiis.
Ata-analardyn ozderinin zhas balalaryna bilim beru turin tandauda kukyghy basymdy
27 bap
er adam koghamnyn medeni omirine erkin katysugha, onerden rakhat-lezzat alugha, ghylymi progresske at salysugha eri onyn igiligin paidalanugha kukyly.
er adam ozi avtor bolyp tabylatyn ghylymi enbeginin, edebi nemese korkem shygharmalarynyn netizhesinde tuyndaityn rukhani zhene materialdy muddelerin korghaugha kukyly.
28 bap
er adam osy deklaratsiyada bayandy etilgen kukyktar men bostandyktardy tolyk zhuzege asyra alatyn eleumettik zhene khalykaralyk tertipke kukyly.
29 bap
er adamnyn, adam balasynyn erkin zhene tolyk kemeldenuine mumkinshilik beretin kogham aldynda mindetteri bar.

Ozinin kukyktary men bostandyktaryn zhuzege asyruda er adam tek baska adamdardyn kukyktary men bostandyktaryn tiisti turde tanu zhene kurmetteu maksaty kozdelgen zhaghdaida ghana zhene demokratiyalyk koghamdaghy moraldin, koghamdyk tertip pen igiliktin ediletti talaptaryn kanaghattandyru maksaty kozdelgen zhaghdaida ghana, zanmen belgilengen shekteuge ushyrauy tiis.
Osy bostandyktar men kukyktardy zhuzege asyryluy Birikken Ulttar Uiymynyn maksattary men kaghidalaryna kaishy kelmeui tiis.
30 bap

Osy Deklaratsiyadaghy eshbir kaghida kasybir memleketke, adamdar tobyna nemese zheke adamdargha atalmysh Deklaratsiyada bayandy etilgen kukyktar men bostandyktardy zhoyatyn kyzmetpen ainalysu nemese is-ereket zhasau kukyghyn beredi dep paiymdaluy tiis emes.
